channel.title: Comments for page "Counterfeit Permit"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Counterfeit Permit"

item.title: Change in price
item.content:encoded: The price change is correct ONLY if you have the General Store upgrade. I've never been in a village without one, but I believe it's still 25k if your village doesn't have one (in which case, the old price should be put back on the page).
